title: Process for Real-Time Validation of Comprehensive Visibility for "perfect feeds"
summary: Validates end-to-end visibility for high-value telemetry so blind spots, ingestion gaps, and rule efficacy impacts surface before they affect detections.
highlights: Systematizes visibility checks across heterogeneous feeds to confirm "perfect feed" coverage.
Enables proactive mitigation of ingestion, parsing, and detection blind spots.

title: Criticality-Aware Drop Control for High-Throughput SIEM Pipelines
summary: Maintains propagation of rare, high-value security events while managing volume through context-aware drop controls.
highlights: Balances noise reduction with the need to keep rare signals visible to downstream detections.
Adapts thresholds using rule context so critical events survive volume mitigation.
